channel.title: Evony
channel.description:
[center][url=http://www.evonyrsps.com/][img]http://www.evonyrsps.com/images/logo.png[/img] www.evonyrsps.com[/url]
[size=4][b]A fresh RSPS with smooth gameplay![/b][/size]
Our server has one of the sleekest gameplays out there. We constantly work to provide our players with fun and realistic content.
Since Evony is a really fresh server, I'd love if you could give it a shot (you most likely wont regret it!). Any type of feedback is highly appreciated!
[size=4][b]Noteable Features[/b][/size]
20+ flawless, profitable Skills! Custom, interactive Dungeoneering! Sleek, realistic, bug-free Combat System. Achievements System which gives rewards for all types of different activities! Challenging and entertaining Quests! Tons of Bosses and limitless PvM possibilities!
[size=4][b]Media[/b][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xdw7QWJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ifwlbcQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/e3rZLQL.png[/img]
Try us out (No registration required): [size=4][url=http://www.evonyrsps.com/]www.evonyrsps.com[/url][/size][/center]

item.title: Evony

item.description:
@SluDm wrote:

Website has been updated!

item.title: Evony
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“SluDm, post:4, topic:550646”][quote author=Stunninhigh link=topic=669556.msg4477325#msg4477325 date=1426801302]
This guy changed the home and npcs thats all he done… Logg in, go to yanille youll see lol.

Goodluck with your server.
[/quote]

Yeah we just launched, so nothing much has been changed yet. Expect a lot of updates in the near future though![/quote]

Should’nt you change things before you launch the server, and I’m not meening just changing the names, moving npcs and removing objects.

But I do have to say… I dont understand how but its pretty impressive to have 16players on in just a few hours…

Read full topic

Goodluck with your server.[/quote]

Yeah we just launched, so nothing much has been changed yet. Expect a lot of updates in the near future though!

item.title: Evony
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

Soulcist:

Your advertising image looks weird, it’s like windshield wipers going across the image lol’d. Anyway, nice thread and decent looking website (granted it looks like it was just made within 24 hours). I wish for the best of luck with this community!

This guy changed the home and npcs thats all he done… Logg in, go to yanille youll see lol.

Goodluck with your server.

Read full topic
